text_idp&sp-all.en: All identity Providers (IdP) and all service Providers (SP)

text_saml20-all.en: Alle SAML Identity Providers (IdP) and all SAML Service Providers (SP)

text_shib13-all.en: All Shib Identity Providers (IdP) and all Shib Service Providers (SP)

error_entity_not_url.en:
The connection ID should be a valid absolute URI complying to RFC 2396.
The syntax is <scheme>:<scheme-specific-part>

error_auth_user.en: Unknown error when authorizating the user to access JANUS

tab_disable_consent_help.en: Mark all services that you want to disable consent for.

tab_remote_entity_help_blacklist_saml20-.en: Mark services that your users are not allowed to access.
Mark those identity providers which are not allowed to acces your service.

tab_remote_entity_help_whitelist_saml20-.en: Mark only those services that your users are allowed to access.
Mark only those identity providers which are allowed to acces your service.

add_metadata_from_url_desc.en: Get metadata from a URL. This URL must target a xml file with the metadatas of the entity.

error_import_metadata_permission.en: You do not have permission to import metadata.

error_import_metadata_url.en: Can not import. Invalid metadata URL.

error_entityid_no_match.en: Entity id in metadata do not match

error_metadata_not_parsed_due_expiration.en: Error when importing metadata due metadata are expired

error_not_valid_saml20.en: Error when parsing imported metadata. Not valid SAML 2.0 metadata

error_not_valid_json.en: Error when parsing imported metadata. Not valid JSON metadata

error_metadata_wrong_entity.en: Error when parsing imported metadata. JSON is not for this entity.

error_no_access.en: You do not have access to this resource

error_user_not_created_due_params.en: The user was not created. Verify that the user ID and type are valid

cert_not_found.en: Certificate not found in entity metadata

missing_require_metadata.en: The following metadatafields of the entity are required but not present:

entity_cert_missing.en: No certificate data for this entity

endpoint_unreachable.en: Endpoint 'LOCATION' is not reachable by Service Registry?

endpoint_domain_mismatch.en: Endpoint certificate is not valid for HOST (it is valid for CN or one of the following: SUBJECTALT)

entity_cert_not_yet_valid.en: Entity certificate is not yet valid
